name: Kwater Lakes (Prototype)
description:
DESCRIPTION

Kwater Lakes is a very early prototype for a game in which you play a space duck with an assault rifle. 

For now, this prototype only showcases the character movement. In the future, it should have aliens you will have to fight against, using the environment to your advantage.

This is my first solo game project. I am using Aseprite for the textures and animations, and GameMaker Studio 1 to code everything and put it all together. I also have plans to edit my own sounds and compose the soundtrack myself.

I hope you enjoy this little prototype and I would love to get feedback from you. Also consider donating if you can as it would help a lot with development !

CONTROLS
  • Left and right arrow keys to move
  • Down arrow key to crouch
  • Shift to equip the assault rifle
  • Mouse to look left and right
  • Left mouse button to shoot
